name: Wayward Wick-Head
description:
Wick-Head, a-Wick-Head, grow your hair, blink and stare. Little Nancy Etteredcoat, I know you’re standing out there. Wick-Head, Wick-Head, with your gunny-sack tattered coat, and your brilliant blazing nose, you’ve grown mandrake feet and a claw-like hand. Wick-Head, a-Wick-Head the longer you stand, the shorter our life grows!

This optional class for MÖRK BORG allows a player to start play as an wayward wick-head, one of the strange denizens of the Dying World. Requires: MÖRK BORG core book. 

Dev-log

  • Released v 1.0.0
